resources.string: A Daydream-ready phone is required. Visit the Daydream Help Center for more information.
Get the Cardboard app in order to configure your viewer.
Set up your viewer for the best experience.
This application may not work properly without enabling Google VR Services, please enable this in phone Settings before continuing.
This application may not work properly without Google VR Services. Please install Google VR Services from the Play Store before continuing.
Place your phone into your Cardboard viewer
Place your phone into your %s viewer
Lumiya needs to be updated to work with Voice Plugin.
Network connection lost. Your messages will not be delivered.
Lumiya Viewer needs to be updated to work with Lumiya Cloud Plugin. Touch to update it.
Lumiya Viewer has a problem with accessing your Google Drive. Touch to open Google Drive.
Lumiya Viewer encountered an error while accessing your Google Drive: %s. Touch to open Google Drive.
Lumiya Cloud Plugin is not installed
Lumiya Cloud Plugin is needed to store your chat history in Google Drive. Touch to install it.
Lumiya Cloud Plugin is needed to store your chat history in Google Drive. Touch to update it.
Swipe left to remove items; tap to touch
Take this object into your inventory?
Take a copy of this object into your inventory?

This software is not provided or supported by Linden Lab, the makers of Second Life. This viewer has limited functionality. For full Second Life experience, please use the official Second Life viewer on a supported platform.\10\10Second Life® is a registered trademark or Linden Research, Inc.
In order to sync your chat history with Google Drive, free Lumiya Cloud Plugin needs to be installed. Proceed to %s store to install it?
In order to enable voice chat, free Lumiya Voice Plugin needs to be installed. Proceed to %s store to install it?
Failed to connect to group voice channel.
Grid with that name already exists
Grid name should not be empty
Login URI should not be empty
Failed to load group member list.
Pick a role in the group
%s has been invited to join the group.
You have no transfer permission for this item.
Joining this group costs L$ %d. Proceed?
You don\'t have enough L$s to join this group.
Joining this group is free. Proceed?
Joning this group will cost you %d L$s. Proceed?
Login name should not be empty
You are a member of this group.
Joining this group will cost you L$%d.
There is no fee to join this group.
This item is not copyable. By sharing it, you will be giving it away. Are you sure you want to do this?
Pick a group from the list
This folder does not contain any subfolders
This folder does not contain any items
Pick an object from the list.
Pick a user from the list
Messages from the group chats in which you participate
Instant messages that are sent directly to you
Messages in the local chat, objects and other general events
Buy object %1$s for L$ %2$d? Your account balance is L$ %3$d.
Object contents are being copied to your inventory
This object contains at least one no-copy item. Such items will be moved (not copied) to your inventory.
You do not own this object and cannot copy its contents
An object owned by %1$s wants to %2$s.
You have enabled voice, but Lumiya Voice Plugin is not installed.
Lumiya Voice Plugin needs to be updated.
Region will be restarted in 120 seconds.
After changing cache location, Lumiya needs to restart itself. Restart now?
An object wants to control your avatar using RLV functions, but you have RLV support disabled. Do you want to enable it?
Pay group liabilities and receive dividends
Eject and freeze residents on parcels
Screenshot taken at %s with Lumiya Viewer (http://lumiyaviewer.com/)
Unable to reach speech recognition service
has requested a teleport to your location
Hint: Slide the screen to switch between contact list and chat
Uploading image will cost you L$%d. Continue?
Install postponed. Voice functions will not be available.
Voice is not supported on this device
Voice plugin has reported an error: %s
Upgrade postponed. Voice functions will not be available.
You have paid L$ %1$d. Your account balance is now L$ %2$d.
You have paid L$ %1$d to %2$s. Your account balance is now L$ %3$d.
You were paid L$ %1$d. Your account balance is now L$ %2$d.
has paid you L$ %1$d. Your account balance is now L$ %2$d.
Your account balance is now L$ %d.
